ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(Opportunity__r.Owning_Country__c = "Poland", TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type) <> "New Pan Euro", TEXT(Opportunity__r.Type) <> "Marketing/B2C Consultancy", TEXT(Opportunity__r.StageName) <> "Proposal Stopped", TF_Annual_Net_Commission__c < 2095.7085)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: An opportunity may not have a Net Commission below â‚¬500
